description: Predict which metabolites show significant spaceflight-induced changes (DE in any contrast, adj_pval < 0.05) from their chemical properties and pathway annotations. Tests whether metabolite identity predicts spaceflight susceptibility.

input_spec.features: Chemical annotations: Mass, RT, Formula, SuperPathway, SubPathway, annotation_confidence
input_spec.note: Expression values excluded to prevent circularity; only chemical identity features used

notes: Spaceflight-specific: target is spaceflight DE, not database annotation
Balanced positive rate (21%) makes AUROC appropriate as primary metric
